page.title: 20A GAME-KINGBALL
page.content: This game is described by a primary school pupil."Players need to mark out a rectangular shaped court with a shaded area inside it.2 teams of 10 players take part.Each team selects a captain who goes to the opposite end that his team are at.He stands outside the shaded area and waits for his team to get the ball over the halfway line to him.Once the captain or king has got the ball he has to try and hit members of the opposing team below the knee.If a player is hit he must then go and help his king.The first team to become all kings loses the game. RULES:No king or player can cross the halfway line. No king can enter a player's area. No player can enter a king's area."
